package.name: acdk_wx
package.title: ACDK wxWindow/wxWidget (acdk_WX)
package.shortdescription: acdk_wx provides a ACDK-Wrapper to create platform independ GUI applications using the wxWindow/wxWidget GUI library.
package.description:
acdk_wx is a ACDK wrapper for the portable %ref[wxWidgets GUI library, http://www.wxwidgets.org/].
Different to the original wxWidgetds C++ library, acdk_wx uses the simplified %ref[ACDK object model, acdk_wx_hb_mapping] (no pointers needed).
Many GUI classes %ref[are availabe in ACDK, acdk_wx_hb_overview_classes].
With %ref[CfgScript, acdk_cfgscript_hb] portable GUI application can be written with C++ or Cfgscript with a %ref[few lines, acdk_wx_hb_minimal].
For more information please refer also to the %ref[handbook, acdk_wx_hb].

The FrameLayout doesn't seem to run stable on all platforms. - Experimental CfgScript GUI Editor and Debugger acdkcsfide. This will run currently only under the Windows platform.
=========================================================== 4.12.0 - Compilation fixes for wxGTK
=========================================================== 4.11.0 - Implemented most wxWidgets classes in ACDK. - Reorganized Event handling. Event types (like EvtMove) are not longer defined as enumeration, but as static members of the corresponding Event class (MoveEvent.EvtMove). - Written guitestrunner to execute ACDK Unit test executables. - Fixed some memory leaks. - Added ACDK specific controls ClassTreeCtrl, ObjectTreeCtrl and CfgScriptConsole.
